subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Sascha Bajin was Serena Williams’s hitting partner and confidant for eight years and for 10 of her 19 Grand Slam titles. Now, he hopes to have similar success with Victoria Azarenka.
snippet: Sascha Bajin was Serena Williams’s hitting partner and confidant for eight years and for 10 of her 19 Grand Slam titles. Now, he hopes to have similar success with Victoria Azarenka.
